titles.title: To provide for improvements to National Flood Insurance Program rate maps, and for other purposes.
IMAGES Act of 2018
IMAGES Act of 2018
Improvement of Mapping, Addresses, Geography, Elevations, and Structures Act of 2018
Improvement of Mapping, Addresses, Geography, Elevations, and Structures Act of 2018
IMAGES Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Improvement of Mapping, Addresses, Geography, Elevations, and Structures Act of 2018 or the IMAGES Act of 2018
This bill reauthorizes through FY2023, and otherwise revises, the National Flood Mapping Program.
